recipe_name: Creamed peas with garlic and coriander
author: Richard Phillips
method: Heat the butter in a frying pan and gently fry the onion and garlic for 4-5 minutes. Add the peas and stir well, then pour in the wine and simmer for 2-3 minutes. Stir in the cream and simmer for 3-4 minutes.  Stir in the fresh herbs and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. To serve, pour the soup into a serving bowl.
ingredients: 25g/1oz butter,  ½ onion, chopped,  1 garlic clove, finely chopped,  85g/3oz fresh peas, out of their pods,  50ml/2fl oz white wine,  75ml/2½fl oz double cream,  1 tbsp chopped fresh chives,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
